QuestData.Title: Your Training Starts Now
QuestData.Description: <Xiao does not look up from his bowl.>$b$bHey, new $g guy: lady;! Glad to see you survived the banquet! Trial One: Complete!$b$b<Xiao eats noisily.>$b$bYou'd better speak up with Instructor Xann. He'll be expecting you for your daily exercises.$b$b<He continues eating. You suspect that he is done talking to you.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Instructor Xann at the Tian Monastery in the Jade Forest.
QuestData.RewardText: First, you drink too much beer... and then you show up to class late? Looks like you've already conformed to pandaren culture.$b$bLet's begin.
